title: FS Pete Wood (Joe's brother) University of Kansas personal sent RPPC reduced
author: bengineno9

posts.post_title: FS Pete Wood (Joe's brother) University of Kansas personal sent RPPC reduced
posts.post_content:
RPPC of Pete Wood and two other University of Kansas ballplayers in Lawrence,KS.
Personal PC of Pete's that he sent to his cousins in Ness City, KS. 
Postmarked May 16, 1909
On the front it reads. "X Pete Wood at Lawrence K"
On the bottom. "Pretty tough looking cousin of yours, Pete"
On the back.
"Howdy Chas and Ella,
I suppose you wonder why I don't write. But boy I'm lucky as heck.
Playing baseball, away on trips and doing my studies and am going to graduate and fixing to get away early so I can go to Joplin about June 4th. Will tell you we about myself when I see and will write later. Drop me a card now and then. 
Pete"



[IMG]http://i105.photobucket.com/albums/m235/bjk721/8fb6ab710d0ad7ff7a9acd38be8e5e4b_zps9e805ed3.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i105.photobucket.com/albums/m235/bjk721/df777d74e7a8a7dc9e794a2e1e3188e1_zps24efc25a.jpg[/IMG]

$850 obo
Open to offers. Please feel free to contact me.

Haha and people get on Fernando Rodney about how he wears his hat :rolleyes:

Love the pic. Those guys have a story to tell.
Great postcard!! Good luck with it
